title: Swipe Typing
description: Draw paths through letters to type words
excerpt:
Swipe Typing

Swipe typing lets you type words by drawing a continuous path through letters. CleverKeys uses a neural AI model to predict words from your swipe patterns.

title: Selection Delete
description: Select and delete text with backspace gesture
excerpt:
Selection Delete

Selection Delete mode lets you select text by holding backspace and moving your finger like a joystick. When you release, the selected text is deleted.
